formBuilder.fieldUnique: Accept unique value for every record
formBuilder.fieldUniqueHoverText: If set, the system will not let two records have the same value for the field. Please note that this behaviour cannot be updated once the field is created.
formBuilder.fieldFilter: Use this field to filter records
formBuilder.fieldFilterHoverText: If set, you can filter your records list view using this field. Please note that this behaviour cannot be updated once the field is created.
formBuilder.fieldTypeRelationshipDesc: Create relationships between objects using a lookup field
formBuilder.fieldTypeRelationshipDescHoverText: This field will allow users to click on a lookup icon to select a value from a list. The target object is the source of the values in the list.
formBuilder.primaryFieldNameHint: This is the object's primary field and cannot be deleted. It is meant to be a unique representation of each record and will appear in lookups and search results.
formBuilder.deleteFieldTitle: Are you sure you want to delete the field {{label}} ?
formBuilder.deleteFieldMessage: This field will be permanently deleted and all associated data will be lost. Do you still want to continue?
formBuilder.disabledFilterCheck: Unique fields will always be available for filtering records in the list view
formBuilder.dropdownChoiceDeleteMessage: Deleting a choice will impact related tickets, automation and reports.
formBuilder.relationshipManyToOneDesc: Link many records of the source object with one record of the target object. i.e Many tickets can be created by a customer.
formBuilder.relationshipOneToOneDesc: Link one record of the source object with only one record of the target object. i.e An individual can have only one Passport.
formBuilder.customizeWidgetModalHint: Select upto 5 fields to display on the widget and search results

errors.minimum: Enter a minimum of one choice!
errors.fieldNameExists: There is another field with the same label in this custom object. Please use a different label.
errors.deleteDropDownChoice: Deleting a choice will impact related records

maximumLimits.filterable: Maximum of {{count}} fields can be used to filter records in the list view.
maximumLimits.unique: Maximum of {{count}} fields can be marked as unique.
maximumLimits.fields: Reached maximum limit of {{count}} fields. Delete an existing field to create a new one.
maximumLimits.lookups: Reached maximum limit of {{count}} lookup fields. Delete an existing lookup field to create a new one.

filters.noFilter: You have not added any filters yet
